# reactive.get_current_context { #shiny.reactive.get_current_context }

`reactive.get_current_context()`

Get the current reactive context.

## Returns

| Type                                      | Description          |
|-------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| [Context](`shiny.reactive._core.Context`) | A [](:class:`~Context`). |

## Raises

| Type                           | Description                              |
|--------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
